entry.title: Saturday: Periods of light snow. Temperature falling to minus 12 this morning then rising.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow. Wind becoming north 20 km/h this afternoon. Temperature falling to minus 12 this morning then rising. Wind chill minus 12 this morning and minus 19 this afternoon. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CST Saturday 18 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Clearing. Low minus 28.
entry.summary: Clearing this evening. Wind north 20 km/h becoming light this evening. Low minus 28. Wind chill minus 19 this evening and minus 33 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CST Saturday 18 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Snow. High minus 15.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. Snow beginning near noon. Local amount 2 cm. Wind becoming southeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 in the morning. High minus 15. Wind chill minus 39 in the morning and minus 24 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CST Saturday 18 February 2023
